gxcfg #1GXcfg
ExpiresFilter com.genexus.filters.ExpiresFilter
ExpiresByType image access plus #2 hours
ExpiresByType text/css access plus #2 hours
ExpiresByType application/javascript access plus #2 hours
ExpiresFilter /* REQUEST
AddResponseHeaderFilter com.genexus.filters.AddResponseHeaderFilter
Service-Worker-Allowed ..
AddResponseHeaderFilter #6/service-worker.js RESPONSE
session-filter com.genexus.filters.SessionFilter
session-filter /* REQUEST FORWARD
